public enum PathChildrenCacheMode
extends java.lang.Enum<PathChildrenCacheMode>

Controls which data is cached

Enum Constant Summary
CACHE_DATA
          Deprecated. The cache will hold all the children and the data for each child node.
CACHE_DATA_AND_STAT
          Deprecated. The cache will hold all the children, the data for each child node and the stat for each child node
CACHE_PATHS_ONLY
          Deprecated. The cache will hold only the children path names.

Enum Constant Detail

CACHE_DATA_AND_STAT

public static final PathChildrenCacheMode CACHE_DATA_AND_STAT
Deprecated. 
The cache will hold all the children, the data for each child node and the stat for each child node

CACHE_DATA

public static final PathChildrenCacheMode CACHE_DATA
Deprecated. 
The cache will hold all the children and the data for each child node. ChildData.getStat() will return null.

CACHE_PATHS_ONLY

public static final PathChildrenCacheMode CACHE_PATHS_ONLY
Deprecated. 
The cache will hold only the children path names. ChildData.getStat() and ChildData.getData() will both return null.
